title: Irelia, best champion in the game undoubtedly, with an overloaded kit.

replies.body: Literally unplayable now.

What the fuck is wrong with Riot. They keep nerfing mechonically intensive champs such as Irelia, Alistar, and Graves because low elo players whine about them. 

Fuck Riot. They nerf all my mains. After the -3 AD nerf on Graves he's fucking F tier now and outclassed by every single jungler in the game. Unplayable. And now they gut my Irelia because the bronze crybabies don't even know how to play against her (even though she's incredibly popular, and they should have a lot of experience vs her). Then next patch they're planning to completely remove Alistar from the game, even though he's already one of the worst tank supports in the entire game: Base HP lowered from 613.36 to 573.36. But then ryce gets a free pass with his fucking bullshit instant point and cluck stun. Favoritism much?

Worst patch ever, absolutely unplayable. Riot tries to appease the bronze scrubs while punishing skilled players such as meself. I quit this garbage shit. Fuck this game
The fact people don’t understand this is satire is astounding
He did lay it on pretty thick without giving obvious shoutouts that it was sarcasm like saying Kai'sa barely gets picked, rito buff her or something blatant.

> [{quoted}](name=Danjeng,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EUIAiOqw,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-10-17T22:26:44.509+0000)
>
> What the fuck is wrong with Riot. They keep nerfing **_mechonically intensive_** champs such as **_Irelia_**,**_ Alistar_**, and _**Graves**_ because low elo players whine about them. 


I dont even need to say anything.

> [{quoted}](name=ïøxö,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EUIAiOqw,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-10-17T22:34:22.183+0000)
>
> I dont even need to say anything.

I think you missed the satire of that post. There are like 5 flags in that post to tell you that it's a satire.

But ehhhh Poe's Law.
WHOOOOOOOSSHH
It's Danjeng. The 2nd best shitposter of r/RyzeMains. It was satire. You should have identified him when he said Ryze is broken  (when he isn't and Danjeng is a Ryze main)
So I'm now looked down upon for not knowing who someone is? Lovely community this game has.
You're looked down upon for lacking basic reading comprehension skills lmao

> [{quoted}](name=Danjeng,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EUIAiOqw,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-10-17T22:26:44.509+0000)
>
> What the fuck is wrong with Riot. They keep nerfing mechonically intensive champs such as Irelia, Alistar, and Graves because low elo players whine about them. 
> 
> Fuck Riot. They nerf all my mains. After the -3 AD nerf on Graves he's fucking F tier now and outclassed by every single jungler in the game. Unplayable. And now they gut my Irelia because the bronze crybabies don't even know how to play against her (even though she's incredibly popular, and they should have a lot of experience vs her). Then next patch they're planning to completely remove Alistar from the game, even though he's already one of the worst tank supports in the entire game: Base HP lowered from 613.36 to 573.36. And then ryce gets a free pass with his fucking bullshit instant point and cluck stun. Favoritism much?
> 
> Worst patch ever, absolutely unplayable. Riot tries to appease the bronze scrubs while punishing skilled players such as meself. I quit this garbage shit. Fuck this game

Alistar...
Graves...

Mechanically intensive..


Uhm... no
Understand. Sarcasm. Please.
/s is there if ya need it... Maybe next time they should use it since they apparently aren't making obvious enough for everyone.
Fucking hell I love Americans so much.
But Irelia is a mechanically intensive champion, just because you dont like playing against here doesnt mean she isnt mechanical.

Meh they should increase her Q cooldowns by a lot.
So bad irelia players get punished for playing her the wrong way.

Unfortunately the problem is not how bad do irelia players for playing her wrong, but how good do ierial players for playing her right.

In competent hands, she's unstoppable.

Moreover, I fiercely hate her design. She has way too many tools in her kit. Overloaded to the maximum

> [{quoted}](name=BadPiriPiri,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EUIAiOqw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-17T22:07:36.502+0000)
>
> Meh they should increase her Q cooldowns by a lot.
> So bad irelia players get punished for playing her the wrong way.

except bad irelia players are not the issue. its the good ones who one shot you level 2

> [{quoted}](name=BadPiriPiri,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EUIAiOqw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-17T22:07:36.502+0000)
>
> Meh they should increase her Q cooldowns by a lot.
> So bad irelia players get punished for playing her the wrong way.

An actual good suggestion on the boards??? what is the world coming to??

> [{quoted}](name=Manly Stripper,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EUIAiOqw,comment-id=00020004,timestamp=2018-10-18T14:34:34.358+0000)
>
> An actual good suggestion on the boards??? what is the world coming to??

doesnt do anything since the reason shes op is not because of those who dont know how to use her.
I think they should remove the resets from her e.
That would completely screw over the champion, she then loses all the fluidity from her kit.
Oh my god now she has average movement speed. How will she be able to dash to me?
Don't forget to mention you waited two+ weeks for that -5 move speed.
I feel like giving her Q a partial instead of full reset on marked targets would be a decent nerf
Then she goes straight to the dumpster with katarina where all that accomplishes is making the champion feel completely terrible to play.

5 MS is more than it seems. 5 MS (and a 33% reduction to her W's bonus resistances along with a 2-10% movespeed nerf on her W active and a 25% reduction in R's knockup duration as well as a 10 damage reduction on R at all levels) was all it took to completely gut Poppy (when she was already at a sub 48% WR)!

>best champion in the game "undoubtedly"
>under 50 percent wr with under 4 percent pick rate

yeah dude

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

50.63 WR at a 7.5 pick rate toplane
50.18 WR at an 11.59 pick rate mid

51% WR on first time players, up to a 55.5% WR after 150 games

> [{quoted}](name=PopcornBunni,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EUIAiOqw,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2018-10-18T03:39:53.537+0000)
>
> {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 
> 
> 50.63 WR at a 7.5 pick rate toplane
> 50.18 WR at an 11.59 pick rate mid
> 
> 51% WR on first time players, up to a 55.5% WR after 150 games

Not what I saw on champ gg, 50 percent isn't exactly overpowered either. You all have no evidence of irelia being op.

while im not gonna argue about if your info is right or not cause i havent looked it up. Never use champion.gg for stats, it is arguably one of the worst sites you can use since lolalytics op.gg and u.gg all do its job much better

> [{quoted}](name=vgamedude,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EUIAiOqw,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2018-10-18T04:38:51.134+0000)
>
> Not what I saw on champ gg, 50 percent isn't exactly overpowered either. You all have no evidence of irelia being op.

But this is the internet. The more often you say things, the more true they are!
Oh yes my backline will definitely be able to kite Irelia now.

Then you see -3 AD on Graves dropped him by more than 2% winrate.

You guys constantly whine about how champs like sejuani got gutted (rightfully whining that is) but when Riot restrains nerfs and dont outright GUT the champ you go balistic.
She's at 50% winrate across all ranks, she is far from "the best champ no doubts 100% facts", slight balance nerfs will be way better for tuning her down without ruining her for the people who legit love playing her.

5 MS won´t suddenly make her drop 2% winrate, like Graves did because Graves had his keystone nerfed as well, while Irelia's keystone, the easily most unhealthy one out of all keystones, still exists.

> [{quoted}](name=JackMcSnipeyz,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EUIAiOqw,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2018-10-18T09:20:01.347+0000)
>
> Then you see -3 AD on Graves dropped him by more than 2% winrate.
> 
> You guys constantly whine about how champs like sejuani got gutted (rightfully whining that is) but when Riot restrains nerfs and dont outright GUT the champ you go balistic.
> She's at 50% winrate across all ranks, she is far from "the best champ no doubts 100% facts", slight balance nerfs will be way better for tuning her down without ruining her for the people who legit love playing her.

She doesnt HAVE to be gutted but come on?! She's the most contested champion, -5ms is as useless as +0.25s cd on Zoe Q. SHE IS the best champion right now, she practically has reached Ahri season 5 status for how contested she is (50-52% wr, highest pick and banrate).

Why does this bitch even have mana?

It's literally impossible to go OOM on her
improvements btw.
Give her Q a cast time like Kat's Shunpo, since that is _clearly_ how you go about designing a champion.
Will you ever stop being bitter?
Uuuuh no? Because Riot has clearly stated that every dash+blink should have a cast time. Don't shoot the messenger.
just remove her bonus damage to shields. It was a forced gimmick to respond to a FotM complaint.
Yea it should've been added as an item like Riot intended to do. I don't want to have to pick Irelia to counter a shield, or kill someone quicker than the Janna/Lulu/Karma etc can react.

> [{quoted}](name=SSW Talon,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EUIAiOqw,comment-id=000e0000,timestamp=2018-10-18T12:56:15.188+0000)
>
> Yea it should've been added as an item like Riot intended to do. I don't want to have to pick Irelia to counter a shield, or kill someone quicker than the Janna/Lulu/Karma etc can react.

_"i dont wanna have to actually play around my opponent."_
Just bait the shield.

:/

Fizz is "OP" for half a patch. Gets gutted. But its ok if Graves, Irelia, Kai'sa, Aatrox, and Urgot are meta for like half the year XD

Urgot meta for half the year?
Dafuq?

People just suddenly have an outcry about him since pros discovered him and now everyone is "Urgot OP, nerf!"
Absolutely no one cared about him before the worlds. xD
irelia HAS to be the best champ in the game, otherwise robbing her entire team of CS via Q spam would be pointless. :O
{{champion:24}}  so much better than her
Ok I'm not gonna say that irelia isn't still op, but 5 ms is kinda a big deal. Us mord mains have been asking for that much for a long time; it really does make a difference.

To be fair, lowering her movespeed to 335 is fucking huge. Base stat changes usually do that but... is that even the right change to make to her? I seriously doubt this makes her kit any less stupid but I mean, I guess you busted her legs right?
